Ğ’ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ 2 Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ñ‹ Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ…. 
Ğ¢Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ° ÑĞ¾ÑĞ·Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ², Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ‡Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ².

[h1]Don't bother with this game[/h1]

I started playing this game when the open beta in 2016 came out and fell in love with it right away. I kept playing it throughout the years even when they focused on ow2 and left the base game without new content because i believed in the team behind it.

I wish i would have just moved on because after that its been nothing but disappointment after disappointment. And every time you think they hit a new low and they couldn't possibly do anything worse, they come up with something else even worse to prove you wrong. At this point I stopped caring. I'm not getting mad anymore over it. I'm just disappointed to see a game that was so great and i spend thousands of hours playing being reduced to some trash. 

Overwatch really went from a beloved game that people cared about to whatever empty husk it is now. I'm surprised that there's still people out here defending this.

[b]Everyone involved with the decisions that were made in the last few years should be embarrassed and ashamed of themselves.[/b]

has blizzard made mistakes with this game?
yes.
did they over-promise and fail to deliver?
yes.
is the game a fun casual shooter?
also yes.

store still remains wildly overpriced however, but honestly compared to the rest of the industry its nothing out of the ordinary.
